resources.string:
Iapp yakho yokuhlola okungabe kuvaliwe kuinternet.

Amawebsite lama app awesocial media avaliwe na? Ingabe ukusebenza kweinternet kuhamba kancane okusolisayo na? 

Vula iOONI Probe ukuze uthole ulwazi.
Impumela ozayithola ngemva kokusebenzisa iOONI iyavezwa kumphakathi lokuthi usebenzisa inetwork yiphi njalo ukuliphi ilizwe.
Nxa bekhona abakhangele okwenzayo kuinternet (abafana loHulumende kumbe inkampani yenetwork oyisebenzisayo) bayenelisa ukubona ukuthi usebenzisa iOONI.
Sungahlola amawebsite angavunyelwayo elizweni lakho (kodwa ungazikhethela amawebsite okuhlola).
